alert.note: Alert for Eastern Mogollon Rim; Little Colorado River Valley in Apache County; Little Colorado River Valley in Coconino County; Little Colorado River Valley in Navajo County; Western Mogollon Rim; White Mountains (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued February 21 at 10:48AM MST until February 22 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Flagstaff
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 20 to 30 mph with gusts up to 55 mph. Locally higher gusts are possible immediately downwind of the Mogollon Rim. * WHERE...Mogollon Rim and Little Colorado River Valley. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Minor tree damage and spotty power outages are also possible. Local blowing dust is also possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The strongest winds are expected to occur Monday afternoon and evening. Winds will subside briefly Monday night, before increasing again late Tuesday morning and into the afternoon.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
